messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: there are [0-9]+ clusters'

Imagine a group of 16 scholars. Amir is connected to Wim, Raj, Jing, and Reza. Wim is connected to Amir, Raj, Jing, and Eva. Raj is connected to Amir, Wim, Jing, and Wei. Jing is also connected to Amir, Wim, Raj, and Pam. Wei is connected to Nisha, Reza, Kim, and Raj. Nisha is connected to Wei, Reza, Kim, and Sara. Reza is connected to Amir, Kim, Nisha, and Wei. Kim is also connected to Wei, Nisha, Reza, and Moin. Ian is connected to Moin, Puja, Sara, and Matt. Moin is connected to Ian, Puja, Kim, and Sara. Puja is connected to Pari, Ian, Sara, and Moin. Sara is also connected to Ian, Moin, Puja, and Nisha. Pari is connected to Pam, Matt, Eva, and Puja. Pam is connected to Jing, Pari, Matt, and Eva. Matt is connected to Pari, Pam, Eva, and Ian. Eva is also connected to Pari, Pam, Matt, and Wim. How many densely-connected clusters of scholars are there in this group? A densely-connected cluster is a group of scholars that are connected to themselves with a minimum of 2 scholars.

Step 1: Identify the connections between the scholars. 

Step 2: Group the scholars based on their connections to form potential clusters. 

Cluster 1: Amir, Wim, Raj, Jing, Reza
Cluster 2: Wei, Nisha, Reza, Kim, Raj
Cluster 3: Ian, Moin, Puja, Sara, Matt
Cluster 4: Pari, Pam, Matt, Eva, Wim

Step 3: Verify the clusters to see if they are densely connected. A densely connected cluster should have each scholar connected to every other scholar in the cluster. 

Cluster 1: Amir is connected to Wim, Raj, Jing, and Reza. Wim is connected to Amir, Raj, Jing, and Eva. Raj is connected to Amir, Wim, Jing, and Wei. Jing is also connected to Amir, Wim, Raj, and Pam. Reza is connected to Amir, Kim, Nisha, and Wei. Since not all scholars are connected to all others in the cluster, this is not a densely-connected cluster.

Cluster 2: Wei is connected to Nisha, Reza, Kim, and Raj. Nisha is connected to Wei, Reza, Kim, and Sara. Reza is connected to Amir, Kim, Nisha, and Wei. Kim is also connected to Wei, Nisha, Reza, and Moin. Raj is connected to Amir, Wim, Jing, and Wei. Since not all scholars are connected to all others in the cluster, this is not a densely-connected cluster.

Cluster 3: Ian is connected to Moin, Puja, Sara, and Matt. Moin is connected to Ian, Puja, Kim, and Sara. Puja is connected to Pari, Ian, Sara, and Moin. Sara is also connected to Ian, Moin, Puja, and Nisha. Matt is connected to Pari, Pam, Eva, and Ian. Since not all scholars are connected to all others in the cluster, this is not a densely-connected cluster.

Cluster 4: Pari is connected to Pam, Matt, Eva, and Puja. Pam is connected to Jing, Pari, Matt, and Eva. Matt is connected to Pari, Pam, Eva, and Ian. Eva is also connected to Pari, Pam, Matt, and Wim. Wim is connected to Amir, Raj, Jing, and Eva. Since not all scholars are connected to all others in the cluster, this is not a densely-connected cluster.

Step 4: Count the number of densely-connected clusters. 

There are no densely-connected clusters in this group of scholars.

Answer: there are 0 clusters.
